item.description:
Come celebrate Sam's descent into old age. Happy 34th!! We're having a party at our home on Saturday night.

We will do it German style by making some oven soup and bread plus provide some beer and wine. But feel free to be American and bring something potluck-style including food and preferred beverages.

But most of all bring yourselves and lots of cheer!!

Bis dann! Wir freuen uns auf Euch!!
item.name: Sam has a birthday!
